      public void changeScore(int points)
      The method is used to increment the score in Player. Score can only be increased so if a negative int is passed it throws an exception
      Parameters:
      points -

    • modifyCompletedCGoals

      public void modifyCompletedCGoals(int position)
      The method changes the boolean that indicates if a player has already accomplished a certain common goal
      Parameters:
      position - This is the position of the goal in the Array

    • modifyPickedTiles

      public void modifyPickedTiles(List<Tile> tiles)
      The method puts the set of picked tiles returned by the pick state in the player pickedTiles array, don't need to worry about the set being bigger than 3 as that check is made by the method that passes the set.
      Parameters:
      tiles - Picked tiles

    • pickedTilesIsEmpty

      public boolean pickedTilesIsEmpty()
      The methods returns true if the pickedTiles list is empty

    • selectTile

      public Tile selectTile(int position)
      The method allows player to select a tile from the tiles in his hand (pickedTiles)
      Parameters:
      position - of the tile in pickedTiles
      Returns:
      the tile that the player wants to topUp

    • verifyPGoalPoints

      public int verifyPGoalPoints()
      Returns:
      the points that the player receives from his personal goal card

    • verifyExtraPoints

      public int verifyExtraPoints()
      The method checks how many points to assign for groups of same colored tiles adjacent to each other in player grid. We decided to use DFS (Depth first search). If you have at least three tiles connected of the same color you get 2 points, if you have four tiles you get 3 points, if you have five tiles you get 4 points, if you have six or more tiles you have 8 points.
      Returns:
      points

    • verifyExtraPointHelper

      public int verifyExtraPointHelper(int i, int j, Color color, boolean[][] visited)
      The method is used in verifyExtraPoints to verify is we are in an admissible position in the grid and if the spot is occupied
      Parameters:
      i - coordinate of the position of the tile we want to verify
      j - coordinate of the position of the tile we want to verify
      color - of the tile in the spot of the player grid
      visited - true or false
      Returns:
      points
